title: Not just genius: Why Verstappen and Senna still needed the right car on the day
summary: Max Verstappen showed his driving genius in steering a flawed F1 car to victory at Baku, just as Ayrton Senna did at Donington in 1993. Or did they? Don't overlook the full picture, saysMark Hughes

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the 2023 Baku Grand Prix?
At which circuit did Ayrton Senna showcase his driving skill in 1993?
What is a key factor that can influence a driver's performance in Formula 1?
